channel.title: Let's fly to the moon.
channel.description: Recent content on Let's fly to the moon.

item.title: About
item.description: In my daytime, I work as a Developer Advocate at a US Tech company. At night, I’m a content creator developing tutorials in data science for the following platforms: 📺 YouTube: Data Professor, Coding Professor 📝 Medium Blogs. 💻 GitHub In my previous role, I was an Associate Professor of Bioinformatics carrying out research in computational drug discovery: Google Scholar ORCID SCOPUS ResearchGate GitHub: chaninn, chaninlab You can also connect with me at the following social platforms:

item.title: Blogs
item.description: 综艺 中国说唱综艺的第五年，无人问津？ “海王”宋智雅，在恋爱综艺里做爽剧大女主 给劣迹艺人打码，成了后期剪辑师的“入门必修课” B站搞综艺，到底行不行？ 内娱选秀一轮游的沈小婷，站在了韩国选秀的C位 电影 《第一炉香》扑街，不是马思纯、彭于晏的锅 《雄狮少年》，又一部“国漫之光”？|对话主创 《长津湖》票房反超《战狼2》，不只靠“吴京超越吴京” 热点 “好男人”人设，翻车 艺人 对话张晓龙：离开“温太医”的十年后 合作稿 张艺兴和康师傅红烧牛肉面，都是“中国味道” 《是这样的，法官》：在“人间”，离“真实”更近
